basic.description: Theory and phenomena of the physics of fluids. A study of the usual incompressible and compressible flows; rotating frames; stability and turbulence; wave motion including non-linear waves and shocks; kinetic theory and transport phenomena; magnetofluid dynamics; plasma; relativistic fluids; and quantum fluids. (Offered jointly with PHYS-422.)
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Fluid Mechanics
